casebody.data:
Dustin J. MERRYFIELD and Lindon A. Allen, Appellants,
v.
Dr. Tomas GARZA, Larned State Hospital Medical Doctor; Barbara Nelson, Larned State Hospital APRN; and Shawn Sullivan, Secretary of KDADS; All Defendants Are Sued in their Individual, Official, and Personal Capacities, Appellees. No. 116,537 Court of Appeals of Kansas. Opinion filed February 9, 2018

Affirmed.
